# whatr <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" />

The goal of `whatr` is to facilitate the analysis of [Jeopardy!][j] data. The
package contains both past data and the tools used to update with future games
from the fan-made [J! Archive][ja].

## Installation

You can install the development version of `whatr` from [GitHub][gh] with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("kiernann/whatr")
```

## Data

```{r}

```

## Functions

```{r}
library(whatr)
library(tidyverse)
whatr_scores(date = "2019-06-03")
whatr_board(show = 8006)
whatr_plot(game = 6304)
```
